response.overview: Angara Dangara (2011) is a Sri Lankan Sinhala children's/family film centering on Gagani, a mischievous and stubborn teenage girl whose disruptive behavior in her city school leads to her being sent to a hostel. Eventually, she moves to a rural school in Monaragala, where a teacher helps her transform into a responsible, brave girl who saves a child from a river.
response.title: Angara Dangara
